name: Xxxatharxyx [It's Going To Be Alright]
description:
Made possible by INDIEPOCALYPSE

Part of Indiepocalypse #31

---------

Xxxatharxyx [It's Going To Be Alright]

The world has no place for you. 

Full of anger and spite, you enact an arcane ritual. Free the demons from their prisons, and their powers are yours. However, there is a price: you must let them use your body to propagate their kind.

Sign me the HECK up!

Descend into a meat-colored hell and beat everyone to a pulp with a giant pipe wrench in this weird gay action RPG. Vengeance shall be yours!

FEATURES:

- Uses the Moghunter Chrono Engine ABS! Run around and hit things from a top-town view like your retro Zeldos and Stars Tropic and what-not

- Four dungeons full of traps and monsters and secrets!

- Four demon boyfriends who will treat you right!!

- Face-punch an angel IN THE FACE!

- Go for the high score! Or don't, see if I care

---------

[18+ WARNING: This game is not for kids. Contains graphic sex scenes, pregnancy-related body horror.  

CONTENT WARNING: Suicide is briefly mentioned twice.

The file contains a censored version of the game if that's more your speed, but it's still a game for mature audiences. Hopefully the censored version will make it safer to stream, but who even knows anymore because we live in Hell]
